description: This method detects a service install of the malicious Microsoft Network Realtime Inspection Service service described in StoneDrill report by Kaspersky Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: StoneDrill Service Install
query: (winlog.channel:"System" AND Provider_Name:"Service\ Control\ Manager" AND winlog.event_id:"7045" AND winlog.event_data.ServiceName:"NtsSrv" AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*\ LocalService)
